caption:
Advanced care for real hair regrowth.

FOLIGAIN’s Advanced Shampoo combines Minoxidil and Trioxidil® to deliver a powerful, science-backed solution for thinning hair in both men and women.

	•	Minoxidil 5%: Reactivates hair follicles for visible regrowth
	•	Trioxidil®: Triple-action complex for scalp health, strength & density
	•	Deep-cleansing formula removes buildup and revitalizes the scalp
	•	Supports fuller, thicker, healthier-looking hair
	•	Use daily for best results

Stronger hair starts here.
Available now at FOLIGAIN.com
